titleStmt.title: A proud and blasphemous cahllenge [sic] given out in denuntiation of warre, by Amurath the great Turk, against all Christendome Coming with an army of 1600000. men.
titleStmt.author: Murad I, Sultan of the Turks, 1326-1389.

notesStmt.note: With two woodcut portraits; one "Emperour of Constantinople", the other "Emperour of Rome".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
